creator: bryan.basham@sun.com

text:
Tested with the current CVS build using the JSP forward test included in the 
examples webapp (it ultimately uses the request dispatcher using 
context.getRequestDispatcher(path).forward(request, response)).
<jsp:forward page="two.html"/> succeeds.
<jsp:forward page="two.html"/> fails and you get a 404 status page.
creator: remm@apache.org
